title: Substation Transformer Health Monitoring
description: An agent is monitoring a large substation transformer for signs of degradation using dissolved gas analysis (DGA).

tasks.description: Retrieve the latest DGA sensor readings (e.g., hydrogen, acetylene, ethylene) from the transformer's monitoring system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent fetches the current gas concentration levels.

tasks.description: Analyze the trends of key gases over the past 6 months.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a rising trend in acetylene levels.

tasks.description: Use the Duval Triangle method to diagnose the potential fault type based on the gas ratios.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent diagnoses the issue as a high-energy electrical discharge (arcing).

tasks.description: Issue a high-priority alert and recommend taking the transformer offline for internal inspection.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a critical maintenance alert.
